text: Cutter's Way (also known as Cutter and Bone) is a 1981 American thriller movie directed by Ivan Passer and is based on the novel Cutter and Bone by Newton Thornburg. It stars Jeff Bridges, John Heard, Lisa Eichhorn, Stephen Elliott, Ann Dusenberry and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1981 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ivan Passer
title: Cutter's Way
